resources.string: This app is developed for educational purpose only. It fetches all data from college.This app store all data only in your phone and it does not promote bunking or irregular activity.
Your internet speed is slow..so it may take some time

Track Your Attendance, Result ,Iter Moodle, Study Collection, Exam Notice, Student Notice ,TimeTable ,Set an Alarm for Your Class Routine ,Plan your vaccation using Holiday and many more.. Currently available for Android devices.https://attendie.github.io/AttendieApp/
